value.name: Rochdale by-election candidates discuss the town's needs
value.description: Reform UK's Simon Danczuk said his "only priority" was Rochdale and tackling crime in the town was vital. George Galloway of the Workers Party for Britain said he wanted to save Rochdale AFC and reopen the market. A number of the 11 candidates standing in the by-election had been due to take part in the debate.

value.name: Keir Starmer’s Gaza problem just got a whole lot messier
value.description: Hoyle’s miscalculation broke common practice. It was a request Keir Starmer had pressed with him personally – and that does not look great in hindsight either.
